summary: A story that follows Kate, a young woman who after a horrible blind date on Christmas Eve, wakes up to find she is re-living that same day and date all over again.
cast: Laura Miyata|Vijay Mehta|Amy Smart|Audrey Dwyer|Richard Fitzpatrick|Jayne Eastwood|Joe MacLeod|Mark-Paul Gosselaar|Benjamin Ayres|Jennifer Kydd|Peter MacNeill|Mary Long|Martin Roach|Cherisse Woonsam|Paul Beer|Shant Srabian|Alexander De Jordy|Riley Gilchrist|Stephan James|Esther Thibault|Michelle Piller|Andrea Lyons|Tara Baxendale|Sedina Fiati|Miles Faber|Joe Ring
keywords: christmas eve|answering machine message|midnight mass|ex boyfriend ex girlfriend relationship|fixed up with a date
title: 12 citas de Navidad
